Exceptions¶

Exceptions¶

Exceptions that the API might throw:

exception ukcloudservers.CloudServersException(code, message=None, details=None)¶

The base exception class for all exceptions this library raises.

exception ukcloudservers.BadRequest(code, message=None, details=None)¶

HTTP 400 - Bad request: you sent some malformed data.

exception ukcloudservers.Unauthorized(code, message=None, details=None)¶

HTTP 401 - Unauthorized: bad credentials.

exception ukcloudservers.Forbidden(code, message=None, details=None)¶

HTTP 403 - Forbidden: your credentials don’t give you access to this resource.

exception ukcloudservers.NotFound(code, message=None, details=None)¶

HTTP 404 - Not found

exception ukcloudservers.OverLimit(code, message=None, details=None)¶

HTTP 413 - Over limit: you’re over the API limits for this time period.
